description: School and former school buildings dot the urban landscape - from Bluecoat Schools, Ragged Schools and huge numbers of Board Schools they tell the history of education in London.

events.name: Virtual Tour: The Story of Schools by Ruth Polling
events.notes: Please book on the Open House website and you will be sent the link in advance of the session

factsheet.heading: Full Description
paragraphs: School and former school buildings dot the urban landscape - from Bluecoat Schools to Ragged Schools and the huge number of Board Schools they tell the history of education in the city. By virtually visiting seven of these sites this tour explores how education became seen as a key public service.
Led by Ruth Polling a London Blue Badge Tourist Guide who has a particular interest in 19th & 20th century social history.

name: Celebrating workplaces of key workers: The Story of Schools - a virtual tour with a London Blue Badge Tourist Guide
